edu.kit.scc.dem.wapsrv.model.formats

Class AbstractFormatter

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.kit.scc.dem.wapsrv.model.formats.AbstractFormatter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Formatter
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    JsonLdFormatter, SimpleFormatter

    public abstract class AbstractFormatter
extends java.lang.Object
implements Formatter
    Base class for all Formatters.

    To use auto-registration, all implementing subclasses need the Spring (at)Component annotation.

    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Matthias Dressel, Michael Hitzker, Markus Hoefler, Andreas Loeffler, Timo Schmidt

      • isValid

        public boolean isValid()
        Description copied from interface: Formatter
        Returns whether this formatter is valid. This means that setAcceptPart(String, Type) was called with a valid HTTP Accept Header part. Without calling this method before, the formatter is always invalid.
        Specified by:
        isValid in interface Formatter
        Returns:
        Whether this formatter has been correctly initialized by setAcceptPart(String, Type)
